idea-plugin.name: Ollama Proxy
idea-plugin.description: Enables using Anthropic's Claude 3.5 models with the JetBrains AI Assistant plugin. This plugin provides a proxy that allows you to use Claude models through the AI Assistant's "Enable Ollama" feature in Third-party AI providers settings. Supported Models: • Claude-3.5-Sonnet • Claude-3.5-Opus • Claude-3.5-Haiku Features: • Easy configuration through Settings → Tools → Ollama Proxy Settings • Configurable proxy port (default: 11434) • Real-time server status monitoring • One-click server start/stop functionality Setup: 1. Install the plugin 2. Configure your Anthropic API key in Settings → Tools → Ollama Proxy Settings 3. Start the proxy server using the Ollama Proxy tool window 4. Enable Ollama in AI Assistant's Third-party AI providers settings 5. Start using Claude models in your IDE Requirements: • Valid Anthropic API key (obtain from console.anthropic.com) • JetBrains AI Assistant plugin
